title: Soudal Quick-Step Domestique Dries Devenyns Takes up Sport Director Role for 2024
content:
The Belgian, who retired in October, will work across the WorldTour and development teams. Elsewhere in the bunch, Jumbo-Visma announces new communications lead.

Read the full article at Soudal Quick-Step Domestique Dries Devenyns Takes up Sport Director Role for 2024 on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
